subs.text: @skinnylatte I‚Äôm kicking myself for not letting them keep believing I flew thousands of km just for a PS5. Then, in their minds, I‚Äôd be The Guy Who Flew Thousands of KM for a PS5.
subs.rawText: @skinnylatte I‚Äôm kicking myself for not letting them keep believing I flew thousands of km just for a PS5. Then, in their minds, I‚Äôd be The Guy Who Flew Thousands of KM for a PS5.

subs.text: @skinnylatte I did, somewhat hilariously, manage to pack it in my luggage and bring it home with all the rest the stuff I brought on that trip.
subs.rawText: @skinnylatte I did, somewhat hilariously, manage to pack it in my luggage and bring it home with all the rest the stuff I brought on that trip.

subs.text: @skinnylatte What worked for me: Jokingly ask the attendants at my hometown Best Buy if they have any PS5s in stock. They thought I was serious (I get that a lot), and they said they had 2. To make small talk, I told them I lived across the country, and they thought I flew in just get a PS5.
subs.rawText: @skinnylatte What worked for me: Jokingly ask the attendants at my hometown Best Buy if they have any PS5s in stock. They thought I was serious (I get that a lot), and they said they had 2. To make small talk, I told them I lived across the country, and they thought I flew in just get a PS5.

subs.text: I made Texas beef enchiladas with applewood charred corn sauce for dinner tonight. [link]

subs.text: It what was possibly a first, or at least a rarity, I cooked the beef and charred the corn in the morning, so that I didn‚Äôt have to do it all at once at dinnertime. That might be a way to reduce my reluctance to cook, now that I‚Äôm busier in the evenings again.

subs.text: Can somebody tell me what my interests are? A woman is asking me and I can never seem to answer that question without people‚Äôs eyes glazing over.
subs.rawText: Can somebody tell me what my interests are? A woman is asking me and I can never seem to answer that question without people‚Äôs eyes glazing over.

subs.text: I‚Äôm tempted to answer with ‚ÄúI own stocks through my RRSP, a little bit of cryptocurrency, and a single share of a sports club in British Columbia, and would own stock in the company I work for if it wasn‚Äôt for the mandatory options buyout,‚Äù but that‚Äôs not what she‚Äôs asking.
subs.rawText: I‚Äôm tempted to answer with ‚ÄúI own stocks through my RRSP, a little bit of cryptocurrency, and a single share of a sports club in British Columbia, and would own stock in the company I work for if it wasn‚Äôt for the mandatory options buyout,‚Äù but that‚Äôs not what she‚Äôs asking.

subs.text: All of my interests are consumptive in nature. I haven‚Äôt made anything, or made anything happen, in a long time. Even with the things I have made, it rarely seems like people are as eager to talk about them as I am.
subs.rawText: All of my interests are consumptive in nature. I haven‚Äôt made anything, or made anything happen, in a long time. Even with the things I have made, it rarely seems like people are as eager to talk about them as I am.
